title: Underrated
text: Don’t know if something changed in time but the reviews seem harsh for what experience we had. Food was great and plenty, service was fast and accurate with very affordable prices. The only reason I gave it 4/5 is because of the single bathrooms, can get rather packed. Great place to eat overall.

title: A stroll with the Gods
text: Pretty much sums it up. Breathtaking, enlightening and downright Godly experience while walking through the ruins of one of the most majestic historical sites in all of Europe if not the World.

title: SIMPLY AMAZING
text: You get a grandiose feeling just walking inside this colossal structure. The audio guides are free, you have a very special easter egg you won’t miss while there and the pictures...now that’s just the cherry on top! Definitely on the TO DO list while in Athens.

title: Good food, plenty of it in a Greek serting
text: Ask for the specials of the day, they are really special! Prices are very good, the staff is friendly and they even have a friendly cat to keep you company!

title: WoW!
text: Spectacular view, very good service and oh my god, the tea! Savor a cup of coffee of tea while taking in the view and you’ve got a once in a lifetime experience! Most of the packages available include about a drink and a pastry. Totally worth it!

title: Read for tip at the end
Out of this world lobby, amazing view, perfect location but "vintage" rooms
text: Hotel is near the metro station and a supermarket, we couldn't have asked for more. They have a small but very nice swimming pool, very polite staff and an incredible lobby with flowers everywhere and furnished with excellent taste. We really enjoyed our stay and it really made it easy for us to see the city fast and convenient.

title: Excellent services overall, 10/10 if the WiFi was better
text: Staff was very polite and helpful, we got all the help we needed and beyond starting from the concierge and ending with the two nice lifeguards Min Bhahadur and Ganesh, Min especially was very good spirited and engaging, always making sure that everyone was having a good time! The spa is amazing, they even have a Hammam pool and massage facilities. Top quality EXCEPT the WiFi... WiFi reception was terrible. Other than that would definitely come back!

title: If you miss this, you're missing one big chunk of Prague History
text:
Comprehensive tour, one of a kind feeling inside the bunker and you get one of the best souvenirs to take home from down there!
But of course, the tour guide, Jan, who was very friendly and had an extensive knowledge on the subject, made this one of the Prague exeriences you are not likely to forget anytime soon...
